biotools.summary: Comprehensive database of Escherichia coli RNA-binding proteins (RBPs). This database documents RBPs identified by genome-wide survey of all known complete E. coli proteomes. EcRBPome also presents a cross-strain comparative account of these RBPs, as well as the constituent RNA-binding domains (RBDs).

bioschemas.name: EcRBPome
